key.name: hide-unknown-battery-state
key.summary: Hide devices with an unknown battery state (may cause issues)
key.description: Some devices misreport the battery state, this setting attempts to detect and hide these (may cause issues)

key.name: hide-elan
key.description: Some ELAN devices do not show a battery state, this setting allows hiding such devices

key.name: device-update-timeout
key.summary: Hide old devices after a timeout (seconds)
key.description: Some devices don't disconnect, this setting allows setting a timeout to hide them if they haven't updated recently
